title: Sigourney Weaver Has Us All Fooled: She’s Really Quite Silly
description: Hollywood has never quite known what to do with her. That’s why she’s relishing her current run of roles in “Call Jane,” “Avatar: The Way of Water” and more.
dc:creator: Kyle Buchanan
media:credit: Chantal Anderson for The New York Times
media:description: “I’m pure instinct, and I’ve learned to trust those instincts,” Sigourney Weaver said.
